column4: evening all i have a major issue which i some how caused. if someone has a second could they look at this http://pastebin.com/563766 and tell me what they think. thanks
try doing a sudo apt-get update, if you have any errors please paste them to the pastebin
k i know i will have errors so i will post them for you thanks :)
here is what i get and it freezes at the end http://pastebin.com/563779
hmm, could you paste your sources.list as well?
what i sthe command fo rthat again
i really appreciate your help with this becuse i have been stuck. i dont know what i might have done
hmm, you got a lot of exotic reps there. I would start by putting a # in the lines starting with ftp://ftp.free.fr

are you still there? any luck?
